dcterms:creator: J. Meier
C. Vannier
A. Serge
A. Triller
D. Choquet
dcterms:description: The dataset includes information on the fast and reversible trapping of surface glycine receptors by gephyrin, highlighting their dynamics in synaptic environments.
dcterms:title: Glycine receptors (GlyRs)

dcterms:creator: A. J. Borgdorﬀ
D. Choquet
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the regulation of lateral movements of AMPA receptors, providing insights into their dynamics at synapses.
dcterms:title: AMPA receptors (AMPARs)

dcterms:creator: M. D. Ehlers
M. Heine
L. Groc
M.-C. Lee
D. Choquet
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the diffusional trapping of GluR1 AMPA receptors influenced by input-specific synaptic activity, contributing to our understanding of receptor dynamics.
dcterms:title: AMPA receptor trafficking

dcterms:creator: P. C. Bressloﬀ
B. A. Earnshaw
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a diffusion-trapping model of receptor trafficking in dendrites, providing a theoretical framework for understanding receptor dynamics.
dcterms:title: AMPA receptor trafficking model

dcterms:creator: D. Holcman
A. Triller
dcterms:description: This dataset models synaptic dynamics driven by receptor lateral diffusion, contributing to the understanding of synaptic plasticity.
dcterms:title: Synaptic dynamics driven by receptor lateral diffusion

dcterms:creator: C. Salvatico
C. G. Specht
A. Triller
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into synaptic receptor dynamics, bridging theoretical concepts with experimental quantification.
dcterms:title: Synaptic receptor dynamics

dcterms:creator: D. Choquet
dcterms:description: This dataset links the nanoscale dynamics of AMPA receptor organization to the plasticity of excitatory synapses and learning processes.
dcterms:title: AMPA receptor organization

dcterms:creator: K. Czondora
M. Mondina
M. Garciaa
M. Heinec
R. Frischknechtc
D. Choquet
J. B. Sibaritaa
O. R. Thoumine
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a unified quantitative model of AMPA receptor trafficking at synapses, contributing to the understanding of synaptic organization.
dcterms:title: Synaptic receptor domains

dcterms:creator: K. Gerrow
A. Triller
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the concepts of synaptic stability and plasticity, providing insights into the dynamics of synaptic connections.
dcterms:title: Synaptic stability and plasticity

dcterms:creator: J. M. Henley
E. A. Barker
O. O. Glebov
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses recent advances in AMPA receptor trafficking, detailing routes, destinations, and delays in the process.
dcterms:title: Receptor trafficking dynamics
